title: Bowman Student Building Support Fund
description: To support updates, renovations, equipment, and instrumentation needs for Chemical and Biological Engineering students in the Biotechnology Building.  Support will also include programs, faculty, staff, and students using this facility at CU Boulder.
marketingContent: To support updates, renovations, equipment, and instrumentation needs for Chemical and Biological Engineering students in the Biotechnology Building. Support will also include programs, faculty, staff, and students using this facility at CU Boulder.
